医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
免疫细胞网络是个性化癌症治疗成功的关键通过分析一段时间内从晚期黑色素瘤患者身上收集的肿瘤样本，路德维希癌症研究中心的一项研究确定了肿瘤中的一组预先存在的病症，可以预测这些患者是否可能对称为过继性 T 细胞疗法 (ACT) 的个性化免疫疗法产生反应。 ）使用肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞（TIL）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Immune-cell-networks-key-to-success-of-personalized-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Immune-cell-networks-key-to-success-of-personalized-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=831fbb6c-f61c-4f49-87d4-22237269d56c Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:09:04 -0500 Immune cell networks key to success of personalized cancer treatment
对医生的信任是提高疫苗接种率的关键“相信我，我是一名医生。”虽然这种表达方式已成为广告口号和文化基因，但医生和护士仍持续跻身美国最值得信赖的职业之列https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Trust-in-doctors-key-to-boosting-vaccination-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Trust-in-doctors-key-to-boosting-vaccination-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a3b01c9-19da-4255-9f66-949fe1b4b319 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 12:49:33 -0500 Trust in doctors key to boosting vaccination rates
研究人员发现了一种控制细菌感染的新方法西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员发现了一种控制细菌感染的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-identify-a-new-approach-to-controlling-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-identify-a-new-approach-to-controlling-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30f8507b-a5f9-4d31-88a6-b9bfafef913c Wed, 07 Feb 2024 12:37:15 -0500 Researchers identify a new approach to controlling bacterial infections

研究发现，寨卡病毒感染史会增加患严重登革热的风险巴西研究人员领导的一项研究表明，患有寨卡病毒的人随后患上严重登革热并住院的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Prior-Zika-infection-ups-risk-of-severe-dengue-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Prior-Zika-infection-ups-risk-of-severe-dengue-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94b29fc1-5a58-470b-8867-39dbdfe610a0 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 12:16:42 -0500 Prior Zika infection ups risk of severe dengue, study finds
生活方式因素是否会影响晚年认知和痴呆病理学影响？美国芝加哥拉什大学医学中心的科学家研究了与痴呆症相关的脑部病理学，例如脑血管病理学、磷酸化 tau 原纤维缠结和 β-淀粉样蛋白积累，是否会改变健康生活方式选择与晚年认知之间的关联在生活中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Do-lifestyle-factors-affect-late-life-cognition-and-dementia-pathology-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Do-lifestyle-factors-affect-late-life-cognition-and-dementia-pathology-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ef7ffe-f6f6-408d-a2d7-c1af71cb15a5 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 12:03:00 -0500 Do lifestyle factors affect late-life cognition and dementia pathology impact?
研究显示未住院的 COVID-19 幸存者失眠率较高研究人员调查了未住院的 COVID-19 康复社区的失眠患病率及其与焦虑和抑郁的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-reveals-high-insomnia-rates-in-non-hospitalized-COVID-19-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-reveals-high-insomnia-rates-in-non-hospitalized-COVID-19-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ef0d222-556a-45a2-b731-7411fad52ebf Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:37:00 -0500 Study reveals high insomnia rates in non-hospitalized COVID-19 survivors
新研究揭示了过敏性气道炎症的性别差异研究人员探索了性激素和染色体如何影响暴露于屋尘螨 (HDM) 的四核基因型 (FCG) 小鼠的过敏性炎症和基因表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-study-sheds-light-on-sex-differences-in-allergic-airway-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-study-sheds-light-on-sex-differences-in-allergic-airway-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34911c76-e7f6-4fa9-b8f2-aac75ef5d956 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:15:00 -0500 New study sheds light on sex differences in allergic airway inflammation
SPOC Proteomics 宣布在 SLAS2024 上推出新产品SPOC Proteomics, Inc 是一家总部位于亚利桑那州斯科茨代尔（总部）和加利福尼亚州门洛帕克的高科技生命科学公司，宣布在 SLAS2024 上商业推出可定制的传感器集成芯片蛋白质组 (SPOC®) 生物传感器，用于有限的 Beta 测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/SPOC-Proteomics-announces-new-product-launch-at-SLAS2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/SPOC-Proteomics-announces-new-product-launch-at-SLAS2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d72dde3e-​​b21a-48c2-b212-afaf474cc49c Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:04:00 -0500
Cell Microsystems 与 OMNI Life Science 宣布建立战略合作伙伴关系，为北美带来创新的细胞分析解决方案Cell Microsystems 是细胞生物学先进工具的领先供应商，很高兴宣布与德国著名细胞生物学公司 OMNI Life Science (OLS) 建立战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Cell-Microsystems-and-OMNI-Life-Science-Announce-Strategic-Partnership-to-Bring-Innovative-Cellular-Analysis-Solutions-to-North-美国.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Cell-Microsystems-and-OMNI-Life-Science-Announce-Strategic-Partnership-to-Bring-Innovative-Cellular-Analysis-Solutions-to-North- America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=645a42ba-5f2d-489c-8a67-fbb16a12f639 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:59:00 -0500
